sys_ui_script.description:
The angular code for the top loading bar. To use, simply include it as a dependency in your app and you're done! angular.module('myApp', ['angular-loading-bar'])
How to include this: <g:requires name="x_aaro2_club_claim.loading_bar_min.jsdbx" />
sys_ui_script.name: x_aaro2_club_claim.loading_bar_min
sys_ui_script.script:
